items.preparation: Peel the ginger, then chop or slice. Put raspberry leaves, nettle leaves, chamomile flowers and ginger in a tea sieve. details.title: Workout With Your Cycle
details.content: Unlike traditional fitness methods designed for men, 28 optimizes energy, hormones, strength, and flexibility by aligning workouts with the phases of a woman's cycle.

details.title: Addressing Hormone Imbalances
details.content: 28's nutritional approach aims to naturally restore hormonal balance, counteracting the effects of synthetic estrogens found in birth control, plastics, and beauty products.

details.title: Understanding Your Cycle
details.content: The menstrual cycle has four phases, each bringing unique changes. Tailoring your exercise and nutrition to these phases can enhance your physical and emotional well-being.

phases.name: Menstrual
phases.description: During menstruation, energy and hormone levels are low. Focus on self-care and gentle activities.

phases.name: Follicular
phases.description: As a new cycle begins, estrogen and testosterone rise, making it a great time for muscle-building exercises.

phases.name: Ovulatory
phases.description: Around ovulation, energy and mood are at their peak, making it an ideal time for high-intensity workouts.

phases.name: Luteal
phases.description: In the luteal phase, the body prepares for menstruation. Hormone levels balance out, but PMS symptoms can appear.
